originalTitle: South Africa expels Israeli envoy over 'violations of diplomatic norms'
title: South Africa expels Israeli envoy over 'violations of diplomatic norms'
content: Ariel Siedman has been given 72 hours to leave South Africa, the foreign affairs ministry says.

originalTitle: Music legend Fela Kuti becomes first African to get Grammys Lifetime Achievement Award
title: Music legend Fela Kuti becomes first African to get Grammys Lifetime Achievement Award
content: Almost 30 years after he died, the Nigerian will posthumously receive a Lifetime Achievement Award.

originalTitle: Burkina Faso junta announces ban on all political parties
title: Burkina Faso junta announces ban on all political parties
content: The multiparty system had been "promoting division among citizens", the country's interior minister said.

originalTitle: Is Israel’s current path setting it on course for collapse?
title: Is Israel’s current path setting it on course for collapse?
content: Political polarisation, economic strain and emigration challenge Israel's future as a secure and sustainable state.

originalTitle: Pep Guardiola renews public support for Palestine at charity event
title: Pep Guardiola renews public support for Palestine at charity event
content: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola wore a keffiyeh and condemned global silence of Palestinian children's suffering.

originalTitle: Giant Hind Rajab portrait unveiled in Spain for anniversary of her killing
title: Giant Hind Rajab portrait unveiled in Spain for anniversary of her killing
content: Activists unveiled a giant portrait of five-year-old Hind Rajab in Barcelona on the second anniversary of her killing.

originalTitle: Former CNN host Don Lemon arrested after anti-ICE protests at Minnesota church
title: Former CNN host Don Lemon arrested after anti-ICE protests at Minnesota church
content: Lemon says he was just doing his job as a journalist reporting on the protests at the church.

originalTitle: Syrian government reaches deal with Kurdish-led forces
title: Syrian government reaches deal with Kurdish-led forces
content: The deal will see the gradual integration of Kurdish forces and administration into the Syrian state.

originalTitle: Trump says 'it would be great' if US 'didn't have to use' military force on Iran
title: Trump says 'it would be great' if US 'didn't have to use' military force on Iran
content: The US president says he has told Iran it has to do "two things" to avoid military action, as the US builds up its forces in the Gulf.

originalTitle: Benfica meet Real in play-offs after dramatic league phase encounter
title: Benfica meet Real in play-offs after dramatic league phase encounter
content: Benfica will face Real Madrid in the Champions League play-offs just three weeks after their dramatic league phase encounter.

originalTitle: Celtic to play Stuttgart & Forest face Fenerbahce
title: Celtic to play Stuttgart & Forest face Fenerbahce
content: Celtic will play Stuttgart and Nottingham Forest will face Fenerbahce in two-legged play-offs to reach the last 16 of the Europa League.

originalTitle: Fulham sign Man City winger Bobb for £27m
title: Fulham sign Man City winger Bobb for £27m
content: Fulham sign Norway winger Oscar Bobb from Manchester City for £27m on a five-and-a-half-year contract.
